data.title: 准备以至少 30 秒的时间回答以下问题
data.subject: Talk about your favorite restaurant.
data.answer: Black Sesame Kitchen is one of the most impressive restaurants in Beijing and serves mostly Asian foods which are of great taste. The most popular dishes served in the restaurant are pan-fried dumplings with seasonal filling, beef with Hangzhou peppers, Chongqing spicy chicken, and braised pork belly. The restaurant is my favorite for some reason. Firstly, I very much love the food served here. Secondly, the environment is brilliant - busy but not too noisy. The most important thing is that the staff are friendly and well-trained. Whenever a dish is served, one of the waitresses will introduce the name, ingredients, and cooking method of it. I go there pretty much twice a month. (114字)
